sentence.Network_en: He rubbed the back of his neck and smiled ruefully at me.
sentence.Network_cn: 他挠了挠脖梗儿，对我苦笑了一下。
他遗憾地对她咧嘴一笑。

sentence.Network_en: She practised her part ruefully, feeling that she was effectually shelved.
sentence.Network_cn: 她懊丧地排练着自己的角色, 觉得自己实际上是被闲置在一边.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 求英文中表达感情的形容词！！！！！！_百度知道 ... mourner 悲伤者 ruefully 悲伤地 sorrily 悲伤地.
英语短文五篇 - 寒窗踏雪的日志 - 网易博客 ... 6．prostate n. 前列腺 7．ruefully adv. 悲伤地, 可怜地 8．crumble v. 碎裂，破碎.
harry potter 我征服阅读的第一步... ... bushy 浓密的 ruefully 悔恨地，遗憾地 cast a sideways look at 向。。。瞥了一眼.
TOEFL托福词汇表（Part 31）|托福词汇 ... rubble n. (一堆)碎石, 瓦砾 ruefully adv. 感伤地 rugged adj. 高低不平的, 崎岖的.

list.abs: " You have to give credit to piracy as the world's most successful distribution system , " one observer comments ruefully .“你不得不承认，盗版是全世界最成功的分销体系，”一名观察家悲叹道。
2 rudimentary unsophisticated a.ruefully sadly a. 沮丧的；悲观的ruin destroy v. 毁灭；毁坏

entry.def: If someone is rueful, they feel or express regret or sorrow in a quiet and gentle way.

example.ex: He shook his head and gave me a rueful smile...
example.tran: 他摇了摇头，遗憾地对我笑了笑。

example.ex: 'Our marriage was a mistake,' she said, looking rueful.
example.tran: “我们的婚姻是个错误，”她说着，看起来懊悔不已。

sentences.sentence: "`I made a big mistake,' he said ruefully"

auth_sentence.content: He added, ruefully: We are all thieves.
auth_sentence.res_content: He added, ruefully: We are all thieves.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He added, ruefully: We are all thieves.

auth_sentence.content: She added, ruefully, We have no neighbors.
auth_sentence.res_content: She added, ruefully, We have no neighbors.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She added, ruefully, We have no neighbors.

auth_sentence.content: He responds by laughing, heartily if somewhat ruefully.
auth_sentence.res_content: He responds by laughing, heartily if somewhat ruefully.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He responds by laughing, heartily if somewhat ruefully.

sentences.en: reflecting ruefully that the great American dollar didn’t buy as much as it used to
sentences.cn: 悲伤地想着伟大的美元已经贬值
